snippet.title: Deep in the Forest Trailer
snippet.description:
Deep in the Forest is a medieval fantasy BL Yaoi Visual Novel by Ertal Games.
Available on Steam and itchio in December 2021, in English and Spanish.

-Wishlist it now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1588680/Deep_in_the_Forest/
-Follow us on itchio: https://ertal-games.itch.io/deep-in-the-forest
-Get the updates on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ertal77
-Buy merchandise of Ertal Games: https://www.ertalgames.com/
-Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/ertal
